mapper.select:
/* 프로모션 번호와 회원번호로 다운로드 가능한 갯수와 기다운로드 갯수 조회 */
select cpn.dwl_psb_cnt, cpn.psn_dwl_psb_cnt, (select count(*) from cc_cpn_issue where prm_no = #{prmNo} and cpn_use_dt is null) as used_cnt, (select count(*) from cc_cpn_issue where prm_no = #{prmNo} and mbr_no = #{mbrNo} and cpn_use_dt is null) as psn_used_cnt from cc_prm_base prm inner join cc_cpn_base cpn using (prm_no) where now() between prm.prm_strt_dt and prm.prm_end_dt + interval '1' day and prm.use_yn = 'Y' and current_date between cpn.dwl_avl_strt_dd::date and cpn.dwl_avl_end_dd::date + interval '1' day and cpn.prm_no = #{prmNo}
